sentences.sContent: The savanna browsing black rhino has a prehensile lip for feeding on shrubs.
sentences.sContent_eng: The savanna browsing black rhino has a prehensile lip for feeding on shrubs.
sentences.sCn: 热带大草原的啮草黑犀牛有能卷握东西的嘴唇，可以用于吸食灌木的嫩枝叶。

remMethod.val: prehens(=prehend抓住) + ile(能…的) → 能抓住东西的

trans.tranCn: 能抓住东西的， 缠绕的
trans.tranOther: a prehensile tail, foot etc can curl around things and hold on to them
